subject: p12185775
History: -year-old woman with bilateral effusions in, followup.
Findings: There has been interval removal of a right-sided PICC line. The cardiac silhouette remains enlarged. There has been resolution of bilateral pleural effusions. Again visualized are two calcified left upper lobe granulomas.
Impression: Resolution of bilateral pleural effusions. Heart size remains enlarged. This could be indicative of cardiomyopathy or a pericardial effusion.
